title: Heather Hall - Spacious 1 Bed with a view
posting_body: Contact us today, limited spaces available!
Welcome to the the newly renovated Heather Hall!
Built in same style as many of Detroit's historical buildings, Heather Hall features beautiful Art Deco styling.
1 Bedroom and studio apartments available for lease with immediate move-in!
Units have newly refinished concrete floors, new kitchens, renovated bathrooms, along with new and improved building systems that offer maximum comfort for all new tenants!
Right now all units are available,  with units as high up as the 10th floor where a view of the detroit skyline and Canada can be fully visible and enjoyed!
Gas + Water Included, Snip internet only, Updated Kitchens, Concrete Floors, Ample Natural Light, new elevator, and On-Site Laundry.
Located in the heart of Midtown:
Steps from Detroit Shipping Co., Selden Standard, SheWolf, Honest Johns, Condado's, Barcade, and the shops & restaurants of Midtown.

*The rental or lease of this property must comply with the City of Detroit ordinance regulating the use of criminal background checks as part of the tenant screening process to provide citizens with criminal backgrounds a fair opportunity.
For additional information, please contact the City of Detroit Office of Civil Rights, Inclusion and Opportunity.
